name: Azure Infrastructure Automation with Terraform and Ansible
description: Designed and implemented an optimized Azure infrastructure using Terraform and Ansible, provisioning Linux and Windows VMs, load balancing, and database services.

name: BookFlix
description: Deployed a Django application on AWS with Docker and AWS RDS Postgres. Integrated robust CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins and SonarQube.

name: End-to-End ML Pipeline on AWS SageMaker
description: Developed a Machine Learning pipeline using AWS SageMaker for model provisioning and scaling, including preprocessing, training, and deployment.

name: Humber Hawkbot: Backend
description: Developed the backend application for Humber Hawkbot, a chatbot providing seamless navigation of resources for students and faculty, leveraging FastAPI and NLP techniques.

name: Humber Hawkbot: Frontend
description: Designed and implemented the frontend for Humber Hawkbot, utilizing React, TypeScript, and Tailwind for an intuitive user interface with integrated AI capabilities.

name: StarGazer
description: Developed a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) model for classifying star constellations, featuring data preprocessing and visualization.

name: Apptist
description: Built an educational platform for Apptist.ca using AWS Amplify and GraphQL, ensuring scalable and efficient solution architecture.

name: Con-Fusion
description: Developed a responsive online portfolio website for a restaurant, showcasing their menu, services and offers

name: Retrofit: Open Source Contri.
description: Contributed to the open-source Java library Retrofit, enhancing its API interface-to-callable object conversion capabilities for Android development.

name: Feel The Notes: Lecturing Platform
description: Developed a real-time meeting platform for Feel The Notes, an institute dedicated to teaching music, incorporating WebSocket protocol for seamless interaction.

name: Farm Trades
description: Developed a platform enabling farmers and vendors to trade directly without intermediaries, utilizing Node.js and MongoDB for server-side rendering and data management.

name: Feel The Notes: Mobile APP
description: Designed and developed a comprehensive mobile application for an online music teaching institute. Integrated interactive features for learning music, such as video lessons, quizzes, and progress tracking, using Java and Android technologies.

name: LeetCode: DSA
description: Curated and solved an extensive collection of data structure and algorithm problems. The repository serves as a comprehensive guide for mastering concepts in DSA with optimized solutions

name: CryptoDapp
description: Developed a decentralized application for seamless cryptocurrency exchange. Leveraged blockchain technology and Solidity for smart contracts, with an intuitive frontend using JavaScript and CSS.

name: Android: Kotlin best practices
description: Developed a series of small-scale projects adhering to Kotlin's best practices for Android development. Focused on clean architecture, efficient coding standards, and performance optimization.

name: Quotify
description: Built a minimalistic mobile application delivering daily motivational quotes. Ensured an engaging user interface and smooth navigation using Kotlin and Android.

name: Voyager
description: Created a basic Android application in Kotlin, focusing on foundational mobile app development practices and an intuitive user experience.

name: Solidity 101
description: Compiled a comprehensive collection of smart contracts ranging from basic to advanced levels. This repository acts as a learning resource for Ethereum blockchain development using Solidity.

name: JetpackUnleased
description: Explored and implemented features of the Jetpack suite for Android development. Focused on leveraging modern libraries like ViewModel, LiveData, and Navigation for robust mobile applications.

name: fireship.io: Open Source Contri.
description: Contributed to the Fireship.io open-source codebase, enhancing features and fixing bugs. Worked extensively with TypeScript, SCSS, and JavaScript for scalable frontend improvements.

name: Android Image-Library Testing
description: Conducted a comparative analysis of Coil and Glide, two leading Android image processing libraries. Delivered insights on performance, usability, and efficiency through a well-documented project.

name: LocusLogs Module
description: Developed modular solutions for LocusLogs, a startup offering vehicle tracking services. Leveraged Java and Android frameworks to implement reliable and scalable modules.

name: Lazygit: Open Source Contri.
description: Designed a simple terminal-based UI for Git commands using Go and the gocui library. Focused on providing a user-friendly and efficient command-line experience.

name: DiverseDarkroom
description: Built a responsive and dynamic portfolio website for DiverseDarkroom, a photography service provider. Utilized Python, Django, and CSS for server-side rendering and frontend development.

name: Lexical Analyzer
description: Developed a basic lexical analyzer in C to identify tokens in C-language code. Emphasized efficient parsing techniques and robust error handling.

name: Django: Open Source Contri.
description: Contributed to the Django backend framework by enhancing core features and resolving issues. Focused on improving scalability and reliability using Python, CSS, and Bash scripting.

name: PAWS: Platform for Anonymous Wistleblowing
description: Expose corruption and misconduct without exposing yourself. PAWS provides a secure, anonymous platform for whistleblowers to share evidence and collaborate with others.
